summary.span: 创建并填充一个 ，它由 用来提供特性查找和注册功能。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 和 来填充生成器，然后调用 来获取包含所需特性集合的 。Use , , and to populate the builder, then call to acquire an containing the desired collection of attributes.

.method public hidebysig instance void AddCallback(class System.Type type, class System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallback callback) cil managed
Public Sub AddCallback (type As Type, callback As AttributeCallback)
public: void AddCallback(Type ^ type, System::Activities::Presentation::Metadata::AttributeCallback ^ callback);
member this.AddCallback : Type * System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallback -> unit

param.name: type
param.span: 要由回调提供元数据的类型。

span.span: The type for which the callback will provide metadata.
The callback method.

summary.span: 指定在需要给定类型的元数据时调用的回调。

span.span: Specifies a callback that will be invoked when metadata for the given type is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首次为 的特性查询由 返回的 `type` 时，将调用 `callback` 来提供元数据信息。The first time an returned by is queried for attributes for `type`, `callback` is called to provide the metadata information.

summary.span: 将所提供的特性的内容添加到此生成器中。

span.span: Adds the contents of the provided attributes to this builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个特性与生成器中已经包含的另一个特性发生冲突，则最后添加的特性将取代以前的特性。If an attribute conflicts with another attribute already included in the builder, the last attribute added replaces previous attributes. 在生成大型特性表时，使用 将创建特性的工作推迟到需要时。When building a large attribute table, use to defer the work of creating attributes until they are needed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable CreateTable ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable CreateTable() cil managed
Public Function CreateTable () As AttributeTable
public: System::Activities::Presentation::Metadata::AttributeTable ^ CreateTable();
member this.CreateTable : unit -> System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable

summary.span: 创建包含通过 调用提供的所有特性定义的特性表。

span.span: Creates an attribute table that contains all of the attribute definitions provided through calls.

returns.span: 可传递到元数据存储区中的 。

span.span: An that can be passed to the metadata store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该表是特性生成器的当前状态的快照；由后续 调用添加的任何特性都不包含在该表中。The table is a snapshot of the current state of the attribute builder; any attributes added by subsequent calls are not included in the table. 如果使用回调方法来声明特性，则在 过程中不会对这些方法进行计算。If callback methods were used to declare attributes, those methods will not be evaluated during . 不过，此表将包含那些回调，在需要时对它们进行计算。Instead, the table will contain those callbacks and will evaluate them as needed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ValidateTable ();
.method public hidebysig instance void ValidateTable() cil managed
Public Sub ValidateTable ()
public: void ValidateTable();
member this.ValidateTable : unit -> unit

summary.span: 验证所生成的特性表是否包含有效的特性信息。

span.span: Verifies that the attribute table that is being built contains valid attribute information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的某些重写 不能验证传递给其参数的值是否表示类的有效成员。Some overrides of cannot validate that values passed to their parameters represent valid members on classes. 验证所有自定义特性信息是否对应于实际成员。 verifies that all custom attribute information corresponds to actual members. 此方法可能需要很长时间才能完成，因此除非明确需要验证，否则不建议使用此方法。This method can take a long time to complete and is not recommended unless validation is explicitly needed.

span.span: the state of the table is invalid.
